description: Protectors of Obscuria who live in harmony with the canyon's mysteries. Monster Rangers scout, survive, and defend using wit, wilderness skills, and mystical bonds with the creatures they befriend.
weapons_note: Unit costs include standard-issue weapons. Weapon abilities and properties are defined in core rules. Upgradeable weapons (like Harpoons) have additional point costs listed in optional_upgrades.

faction_features.name: Befriend Monsters
faction_features.effect: Monster Rangers can befriend monsters using Pocket Snacks (contested Quality rolls) or specialized befriending abilities (Befriend Beast, Befriend Bloodless, Befriend Spirits, Befriend Automat, Befriend Kaiju). Befriended monsters activate with Rangers.

faction_features.name: Branch System
faction_features.effect: Rangers belong to different Branches (Crow, Conjure Guard, Doom Mime, Signal, Skull, Yokai, etc.) which grant thematic abilities and playstyles.

faction_features.name: Diverse Specialists
faction_features.effect: Monster Rangers field incredible variety: stealth scouts, mystic casters, medics, mechanics, psychics, undead caretakers, titan specialists, flying daredevils, and more.

units.name: Core Ranger
units.weapon: Standard-issue Ranger Hatchet, now balanced for throwing!
units.lore: Field-trained Monster Ranger infantry straight from Boot Camp. Signature tool: hatchet, equal parts weapon and working tool.
units.tactics: Baseline skirmisher. Thrown hatchets for short-range pressure, finish in melee.

units.tactics: Pressure engine (Brute role). Stealth + Fear creates board denial. Commits to combat, grinds enemies down. Makes bad decisions unavoidable.
